cards.name: Agony
cards.ability: After you play a card here, merge this with it.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.ability: End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

cards.name: Blink
cards.ability: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.

cards.name: Domino
cards.ability: You always draw this card on Turn 2, and not before.

cards.name: Gwenpool
cards.ability: On Reveal: Pick a random character in your hand 3 times. Give +2 Power each time.

cards.name: Invisible Woman
cards.ability: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

cards.name: Mobius M. Mobius
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your Costs can't be increased. Your opponent's Costs can't be reduced.

cards.name: She-Hulk
cards.ability: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.

cards.name: Sunspot
cards.ability: End of Turn: Gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

cards.name: Dormammu
cards.ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #3
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy 2 of your characters here to summon Dormammu. (step 3/3)

cards.name: Galactus: First Steps
cards.ability: My Herald is the next character I see you play. End of Turn: +2 Power if you're winning my Herald's location. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Astral Projection
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of an On Reveal card in your hand.

items.title: Grand Arena
items: Choose your Champion from a roster of eight iconic characters, then battle using unique decks and powerful skill cards tailored to each hero. Mole Man and Mad Thinker will be available as rewards during the event!

items.title: Golden Gauntlet World Championship Series
items: A celebration of player-powered competition—open to all, free to enter, and full of SNAP energy. Visit Discord for more info.

items.name: Zabu
changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.name: Bullseye
changes: 3/3 – Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

items.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
changes: 3/3 – After an enemy card is played here, destroy it. (once per game)
3/3 – After an enemy character is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

items.name: Mirage
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.
2/3 – On Reveal: Copy the character that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.

items.name: Marvel Boy
changes: 3/1 – End of turn: Give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

items.name: Jennifer Kale
changes: 2/2 – Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

items.name: Green Goblin
changes: 3/-3 – On Reveal: Switch sides.

items.name: Doctor Doom 2099
changes: 4/3 End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

items.name: Sunspot
changes: 1/1 – End of Turn: Gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

items.name: Gwenpool
changes: 4/6 – On Reveal: Pick a random character in your hand 3 times. Give +2 Power each time.

items.name: Dormammu
changes: 7/11 – Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

items.name: Dormammu Summoning Ritual #3
changes: 3 Cost – On Reveal: Destroy 2 of your characters here to summon Dormammu. (step 3/3)
3 Cost -> 2 Cost

items.name: Black Cat
changes: 2/6 – End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

items.name: Invisible Woman
changes: 2/3 – Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

items.name: Domino
changes: 2/3 – You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

items.name: Mobius M. Mobius
changes: 3/3 – Ongoing: Your Costs can’t be increased. Your opponent’s Costs can’t be reduced.

items.name: Agony
changes: 1/2 – After you play a card here, merge this with it.

items.name: Blink
changes: 5/7 – On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.
